ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do y ou do 'em?
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t personally fought him, but I was in the same room with my best friend right after they put him in awhile back and he dropped a red and a green, I saw
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't personally fought him, but I was in the same room with my best friend right after they put him in awhile back and he dropped a red and a green, I saw it with my own eyes.

Now I don't know if that has changed since they "wimped" him down some, or maybe patched that right away, but I know for a fact he did then.

Sorry if I may have gotten your hopes up :(

---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: "Daniel Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 31 Jul 2001 12:49:45 -0500

According to the backstage board - Nortlav has never dropped anything but a
Red. Occasionally drops two of them. No one has ever confirmed a drop of a
green (at least on that board). Quamper (you didn't sign) have you seen a
green drop?

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: quamper [mailto:mail@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2001 12:24 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
y ou do 'em?


I can confirm, he can drop multiple red scales and green scales (though I
haven't seen green in multiple).


---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 31 Jul 2001 10:06:40 -0500

Thanks for the tips (other posters).

I think he drops red and sometimes green scales.

Syl

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: Monday, July 30, 2001 10:07 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
y ou do 'em?


What scale does he drop? Just the red one?

Mu
